title: James Galway Program 4
brief_description: Siner, Maureen Braithwaite is introduced by James Galway, flautist, and joined by percussionist, Evelyn Glennie and clarinettist, Emma Johnson, to perform “Danse Macabre” (sung) by Saint Saens, “Sonata Finale” by Poulenc, “Donde Leiter” from “La Boheme” by Puccini, “Study on Black Keys” by Chopin, “Jeannie with the Light Brown Hair”, “Tambourin Chinois” by Kriesler, “Summertime” by Gershwin. Rated: G
